title: Will Verstappen's nightmare continue? - What to watch for at the 2025 Dutch GP
summary: The second part of the 2025 F1 season kicks off at Zandvoort, where Verstappen faces the toughest home race of his career, McLaren's title fight gathers pace, and driver-market uncertainty lingers in the background

What team is involved in a title fight during the 2025 F1 season?
Where is the 2025 Dutch GP held?
